situation.title: When we will have the vaccine?
situation.meta_description: Since the beginning of the pandemic, researchers around the world have been trying to create a safe vaccine against the new coronavirus.

content.processed:
Information

Since the beginning of the pandemic, researchers around the world have been trying to create a safe vaccine against the new coronavirus.

Thanks to the conditions contracted by the European Union, the Czech Republic plans to buy 3 million doses of the vaccine from AstraZeneca, which cooperates with experts from the University of Oxford.

The first delivery is scheduled for the end of this year.

related_situations.title: What does the R value mean?
